snippet: The Suffolk University two-day tracking poll shows Ron Paul steady in second place, while Jon M. Huntsman Jr. and Newt Gingrich are basically tied at third.
abstract: The Suffolk University two-day tracking poll shows Ron Paul steady in second place, while Jon M. Huntsman Jr. and Newt Gingrich are basically tied at third.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- While Mitt Romney remains the front-runner among Republican primary voters in New Hampshire, his once formidable lead appears to be slipping.

headline.main: Romney's Lead in New Hampshire Slips in Poll
